article.headline: McNeese St. 80, Louisiana Tech 70
article.story: LAKE CHARLES, La. -- Patrick Richard scored 20, Stephan Martin added 16 and C.J. Collins had 15 to lead McNeese State past Louisiana Tech 80-70 on Saturday. The Cowboys (5-3) have won all five of their home games this season by an average margin of 12.6 points. P.J. Alawoya grabbed 10 rebounds and scored eight points for McNeese State, while Diego Kapelan added 13 points. The Cowboys shot 23 for 43 from the floor (53.5 percent), including 10 of 19 from 3-point range (52.6 percent) and 24 of 32 from the free-throw line (75 percent). Louisiana Tech outrebounded the Cowboys 39-26, but managed to shoot just 21 of 54 from the field (38.9 percent) and 9 of 28 in the second half (32.1 percent). Lonnie Smith scored 19 points off the bench to lead the Bulldogs (7-4), who have lost three of their past five games after a 5-1 start.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
